name: Awful Pinball
description:
Left and Right or A and D to flip the flippers. Press R to restart.

I'll probably make a brick breaker version next if that would be fun. It probably won't. I'll probably make it anyway.

EDIT: I am not going to do that.

Also this seems to crash a lot. You can download it and it might be fine.

Edit: It might not be fine. I think I might have underestimated how awful this pinball is.
